page.title: 08OUR SCHOOL
page.content:
Our primary school has 4 classrooms but one of them is used for the pre-school playgroup. We have 3 teachers, two cooks, a secretary and two cleaners. A music teacher comes one afternoon a week. Our school is quite small with just 53 pupils. The things I like best are swimming,singing,gym and some work like language and art. I don't like maths.
When we leave Chapelgreen Primary School we go to Kilsyth Academy. There are about 950 pupils there. They get all sorts of work to do like sports, wood-work, French and home economics. I am a bit nervous of going to the academy.
